txt.en:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>

Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.

<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline turns your focus toward survival in battle. Skills utilize your mount as a means to avoid direct conflict and to assist you in defending yourself throughout the course of a fight.
